With a huge explosion of milk you break the surface: a 3000 pound obese mer-girl, your huge titanic breasts the size of bean-bags, arms like an inflatable toy and a face nearly enveloped by your immense cheeks. Your skin is taunt like a balloon, filled to the brim with milk. You dive back under and find you now can see clearly through the milk as if it was clear water. With a flick of your mammoth tail you go barrelling through the water, your growing hair streaming behind you.
Do you:

You began to wonder what was going on with you; you were sloshing, so did that mean that all this weight was just milk and when your body had finished processing it, you'd go back to normal?!

What happens?

142.content:
"The Wonderland White Fox is impossible to catch," you read on the brochure. "However, they will come to play with..." you begin, before your eyes widen. "Big babies?" That can't be right....can it?

Unfortunately, you need your wallet so you have to try something.

"Step 1: Look the part,"

You then happen to notice a box with a sign, "Free Baby Diapers and Clothes," No one is here and you just need to wear them for a second. You sigh and open the box to find large diapers and overalls like a baby boy would wear, only much bigger. There's also various blue shirts, so you strip down and put on the diaper first. You slip the shirt on next, and then finish with buckling on the overalls. People called you a tomboy before...good thing they're not around.

"Step 2..."
142.title: To Catch a Fox

Bulk up? What the hell?

It was then you happen to see three strange looking bottles in front of you. There is a sign that says, "Drink One,"

The one on the left looks to be chocolate and has a sign next to it that says, "For regular bulking up,"

The one on the right appears to be strawberry and says, "For bulking up and going up,"

The one on the right looks to be vanilla and has a sign that says, "For bulking up and going down,"

It says to bulk up, so you really have much choice, do you? Which one do you drink?
1421.title: "You Must Bulk Up,"

choices: "That's it; you're officially a big baby!"
14211.content:
You decided to take the chocolate milk.
Regular bulking up seemed the least bothersome, and besides, you loved chocolate, so you took the bottle and began to drink.
You began to get fatter, but your clothes stretched to accommodate your size.
When all the chocolate milk was gone, you were now about twice as bulky as normal.
"OK, now I've bulked up, what's next?" you said to yourself.

What does the guide say?
14211.title: Chocolate (Weight Gain)

142112.content:
As the guide itself said that you're officially a big baby.

But there was one more thing that the guide forgot to mention.

The guide itself says there's a special wrestling tournament for big baby wrestlers and sumo wrestlers that you'll definitely want to enter and start training for.

"A special wrestling tournament for big baby wrestlers and sumo wrestlers? Should I start training for this special tournament and then enter it or should I forget about it anyway?" You asked yourself.

What will you do?
142112.title: "That's it; you're officially a big...

choices: You go to a training school.
You see someone and ask if they can train you.
1421121.content:
"Well," you thought, "While I'm waiting for the fox to come, I might as well entertain myself, and I can't just enter a wrestling tournament untrained."

How do you go about your training?
1421121.title: Train for the special wrestling tournament firs...

choices: The next day of training gets underway.
14211213.content:
At that moment you see a group of a few big fat babies in other words a brown animated anthropomorphic Airedale who goes by the name of Shep a brown animated anthropomorphic basset hound who goes by the name of Shorty and a blue rat who goes by the name of Wilfred.

"Excuse me but there's a special wrestling tournament for big fat baby wrestlers and sumo wrestlers, and I was wondering if you all can train with me for this special tournament?" You asked.

"Why yes we'll train with you since we're all entering this special tournament as well." Shep answered.

At that moment all of four you began training with each other as you wrestled against Shep himself as the other two watched as you both wrestled each other as you managed to beat Shep quite easily.

"I'll admit you're a pretty good wrestler and all, but when that special tournament gets underway there's gonna be a lot of tough competition that we'll all be up against. Also it's time for Shorty and Wilfred to wrestle, okay boys you're up next." Shep said.

Now Shorty and Wilfred were sumo wrestling against each other as Shorty somehow managed to push Wilfred out of the ring with ease as he helped his teammate get back up.

After having finished up your training for the day at that time you and the boys then head over to the nearest hot tub that was big enough for all four of you as you all took off your diapers and heavily stepped into the hot tub to relax as each of you grabbed a big bucket of extra fattening and extra tasty mashed ice cream that each of you started eating out of and gained more weight while growing slightly larger as you had a big bucket of extra fattening and extra tasty vanilla flavored mashed ice cream, Shep had a big bucket of extra fattening extra tasty blueberry flavored mashed ice cream, Shorty had a big bucket of extra fattening extra tasty butterscotch flavored mashed ice cream and Wilfred had a big bucket of extra fattening extra tasty rocky road flavored mashed ice cream.

Now what will happen next?
14211213.title: You see someone and ask if they can train you.

142112131.content:
And so the next day of training began early in the morning as you were at a wrestling performance center/sumo stable as the others themselves heavily waddled their way inside as they greeted you upon seeing you.

"Good morning boys." You said to the other big fat babies.

"Good morning indeed, as we're gonna finish up our training and get ready to compete in the special wrestling tournament later today." Shep said as he greeted you and was also fired up for the special wrestling tournament as he heavily waddled over to where the wrestling ring was at as he climbed into the wrestling ring where you were at.

"Good morning my fellow big babies, as we're gonna clobber our competition at the special wrestling tournament." Shorty said as he stood on his side of the sumo wrestling ring.

"Good morning everyone as we're really gonna flatten our competition at the special wrestling tournament." Wilfred said as he stood on the other side of the sumo wrestling ring.

You and Shep started training in the wrestling ring as you heavily waddled towards each other and grappled each other as you managed to pick up Shep with ease as you easily slammed him onto the canvas as you pinned him and counted to 3 as you helped him get back up.

At that moment Shorty and Wilfred both did their traditional sumo stomp and threw salt all around the ring in order for the sumo wrestling ring to be purified along with warding off evil spirits as well.

Shorty and Wilfred then got into position as they then tried to push each other out of the ring as Shorty managed to push Wilfred out of the ring with ease.

"Now then boys there's just one last thing we gotta do before we go over to the arena where the special wrestling tournament will be held, in other words we gotta lift some weights and also see how huge and powerful we are by looking at some mirrors." Shep said.

You and the other big fat babies then heavily waddle over to where the dumbbells and barbells were at as each of you then lifted each dumbbell and barbell up and down a few times until you all put the dumbbells and barbells down as you all heavily waddle towards the nearest mirrors as each of you had seen your huge powerful big fat baby selves.

"Act the part?" you say. "WHAT THE F#*@ DOES THAT MEAN!?!"
As you begin to curse this stupid place, this even more stupid brochure and especially the fox that led you here, you see a pouch attached to the back of the brochure.
You halt your tirade to examine the contents of the pouch:

1. A pink pacifier. (Suck me.)
2. A baby monitor. (Talk to me.)
3. And *gulp* laxatives. (Digest me.)

You feel you should just leave this place and forget the wallet, and suddenly notice the disappearance of your old clothing.
After another bout of cursing, you decide you have no choice but to hope that you'll be able to find your clothes with the fox, and that no will find out about this...

14222.content:
"Um...hello..?" You hesitantly say into the baby monitor, (though you could swear it came out more like "hewow")

"Awwe," cooes a woman's voice on the other end; it's very motherly and warm. "Baby's awake, huh? Don't worry, Mommy's coming!"

Deeply confused, and totally perplexed as to just what is going on, you simply stand there dumbly in your diapers and overalls.

You don't have to wait long however, as after a moment, a giant sized figure begins approaching you. Shocked and scared, you fall down on your padded rear, and begin crying just a little bit.

Once the figure is right up on you, you get a better look at her. It's a giant woman, about 3 or 4 times as tall as you, and she looks to be dressed in some sort of white, fur bikini, like someone would where at one of those nerd conventions. She has pointed ears and a long tail-LIKE A FOX!

This must be the fox, changed into giant, humanoid, form! Now's your chance to get your wallet back!

Just as you are thinking this, the giant, fox/lady reaches down to scoop you up off the ground.

"Awwe, don't worry, Sweety, "Mamma's here!" She says, cradling you against her breast.

You begin to tremble in fear and humilation at all that is going on. However, you also experience another feeling: anger.

First, she steals your wallet, and now, she's trying to treat you like a baby! How dare she! Time to speak up!

But what will you say?
14222.title: SOUNDS Like....!

choices: Lie There Till She Returns (Risk Diaper Rash)
142221.content:
You open your mouth to scream "Give me back my wallet!" but all that comes out is a whiny: "Me want Wa Wa!"

"Awwe," She cooes, as she begins carrying you along. "Baby thirsty?"

You shake your head violently in protest, and try to speak out, but all the comes out is some incoherent baby noises-what is happening to you!

You try to struggle free of her grasp, but she holds you tight.

A few moments later, she sits down with you on a massive love seat-where did THAT come from???

Then, she takes out a massive baby bottle full of water-by this point, you are beggining to accept the fact that, around here, things often just appear out of nowhere.

Next, craddling you against her bosoms, she begins to gently guide the nipple of the bottle towards your face.

"Come on, Sweety, time for your ba ba

When you try to turn your face away, she grabs your head and firmly turns you back towards the bottle.

As the tip of the nipple reaches your lips, you find that for some reason, you can't help but take it in, and begin suckling it like a baby, even as you feel a deep sense of embarrassment at doing so. Several minutes later, the bottle is finally finished, and you sigh in relief that this humiliating experience is finally over-or so you thought!

"Awwe, did Baby enjoy her wa wa?" She cooes. You groan inwardly at her misinterpretation of the word "wallet." "Now, Baby needs to drink her Milkies to grow up big and strong!"

And so, a second bottle is promptly brought your lips, and you are forced to endure yet another humiliating bottle feeding as she holds you in her arms.

Finally, it's over, but you are bound for a further humilation, as she slings you over her shoulder, and begins patting you firmly on the back-she's burping you!

As embarrassing as it was being bottle fed, this is far worse, especially when you finally let out a loud, distinct, *BELCH!*

You blush bright red with humiliation, as "Mommy" praises you for being a "good baby"

"Now then, I think Baby needs a nap!"

She says, carrying you away again, until she comes to a giant baby crib.

She lays you down, and tucks you in tight, before popping a pacifier in your mouth.

"Now, here's your pacifier, but just call Mommy if you need her," She says, indicating another baby monitor beside the crib.

She kisses you on the forehead and walks away.

Once she is gone, you struggle to undo the covers, but they're far too tight. Finally, you resign yourself to your fate, and eventually fall asleep from boredom. You awaken some time later, finding your pacifier gone, and to your shock, your diaper is not only wet, but messy, too!

It feels Soooo uncomfortable. If you lie here much longer, you may get a diaper rash. Looking over at the baby monitor, you consider calling Mommy, but hesitate; the baby monitor is what started all this, and it seems like lately, every time you talk, your situation, and your speech, get worse and worse.

Still, is it really worth getting diaper rash over?
142221.title: Demand She Return Your Wallet!

info.description: You're walking home one day when out of nowhere a white fox grabs your wallet and flees. You chase after it...and fall into a strange world where you're about to become a real big baby...
